event.title: remained a small settlement for many centuries

data.event: Weston remained a small settlement for many centuries.

event.title: the 1960s, large housing estates were placed

data.event: During the 1960s, large housing estates were placed on either side of the village, towards the western cliffs, and Easton village.
The building of the Haylands housing estate commenced during the late 1960s.
